General.Name: MPHB Capital Bhd
General.Description: MPHB Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in credit operations and investment portfolios management businesses in Malaysia. The company operates through Credit and Investments segments. The company offers credit and leasing, hire purchase, general loan, and financing services. It also engages in the property investment, holding, development, and management, as well as hotel operation, factoring, and plantation activities. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
